select NO , TITLE , ID , NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , SIMPLE , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD hh:dd') AS "START_DATE" , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD hh:dd') AS "END_DATE" , TO_CHAR(START_ENTER, 'YYYY/MM/DD hh:dd') AS "START_ENTER" , TO_CHAR(END_ENTER, 'YYYY/MM/DD hh:dd') AS "END_ENTER" , CONTENT , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , DISPLAY_NY , EVENT_PASSWORD , HASH_TAG , URL , MAX , MAX_ACCESS , ADULT_ACCESS , CATEGORY_NO , MEM_NO , TABLE_NO , ATTEND_PASSWORD , COUNT , FILE_PATH from ONLINE_GROUP_ONCE join GROUP_UPLOAD USING (TABLE_NO) where status = 'Y' and file_level = 1 and table_no = #{tableNo} AND GROUP_BOARD_NO = NO order by NO desc
mapper.update: update ONLINE_GROUP_ONCE set count = count + 1 where no = #{no} and status = 'Y'
